title: So tanks are getting an update
body: Anyone hoping for certain changes on champions? mine is leona and that she gets reworked into a solo laner/jungler/support (her passive is lost power in a solo lane)

I think they could do a lot with Maokai, given that he's a big piece of rock. His "send a rock towards the enemy that slows htem" is too long ranged, imo (though I'm probably wrong) and his ult is too fast, and is basically a faster sion ult. I say make him more rock-like. Give him more shields and ways to increase durability, and change his ult just a bit so that it can be slower and more "moving mountain"-ish, while preserving that sense of "crap crap he's charging us!"
